website_summaries.verdict: A solid Diamondback bike built for girls with a similar quality and design to adult-sized models. Definitely worth it if you need a compact bike.
pros: This is the perfect bike for girls, thanks to the 24-inch wheels, 14 speeds, and compact frame
Even petite women may find it pleasurable for short, casual rides
cons: Assembling the brakes can be difficult, though the rest of the bike is pretty simple to put together

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I think this bike is really wonderful. It wasn't super difficult for my fiance to put together, and it rides really smoothly. The seat is a bit uncomfortable, but I think that depends more on the person riding it. Also, I was a little disappointed that this bike doesn't come with a kickstand. We had to buy a separate one and put it on. Either way, great bike, and you really can't complain with this price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ferg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kids bike
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old Daughter loves this bike. The shifting is crisp and accurate and she loves the big wheels and smooth, fast ride. Assembly was on par for an adult road bike. Some people may want a bike shop to put it together and get the brakes and shifting dialed in. I was able to get it put together with the tools included but I've built and maintained road and mountain bikes for many years.
customer_reviews.author: 2001748sTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great kids bike.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is nicer than the really cheap bikes that are on the market. We like to buy bikes that can last for both of our kids to use, and so far this bike seems like it will. It's more of a road style bike and not really a mountain bike, so just be aware of that when purchasing. It's hard to find kids bikes with alloy frames that are in this price range so if that's what you are looking this one will work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: lebardt

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, had to order a kickstand separately.
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy bike, but lost a star because my daughter's first "big girl bike" didn't include a kickstand. We had to order and install separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Insight and Clarity for our 8 year old twin grandchildren. They shipped for free and arrived on time three days later. (The Insight actually arrived a day earlier.) Assembly was straightforward and easy. The only issue was the assembly manual wasn't very clear on balancing the brake pads, but it worked itself out with a little trial and error. The bikes appear well made and very little adjustment was needed, The kids love the bikes! We rode almost 10 miles on the bike trails after a little instruction and practice in our driveway. Now our son-in-law wants a bike to be able to ride with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Dogfarm

customer_reviews.title: Solid bicycle, good investment
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and solid bike. I didn’t want to invest too much into a bicycle until I really committed to riding, yet, I didn’t want a cheap one either. This is perfect. Pretty easy to put together. I did get it tuned up at a bike shop though. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SST79

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, light bike for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Decent bike for the price. I had the same issue of the foot rubbing against the front tire until I realized that I put the bike together wrong and the front fork was backwards. Once I turned it around and had it right, it worked well. This is a nice, light bike for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Is it just me or is everything, even mediocre products, getting so darn expensive?
customer_reviews.text: It's too small for me to get on and ride, but my daughter likes it better than her last bike. Could have better directions for the brake installation, too.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Dad

customer_reviews.title: Some damage
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked my bike there was paint scraped off in one part
customer_reviews.author: geodegoddess

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old loved it, would work for shorter child as well
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved it, would work for shorter child as well. Front shifter is hard to turn. Everything else is just right though
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: The gears change smoothly and the seat is comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike! The gears change smoothly and the seat is comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, no parts
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old and after a minor collision, in which she didn't even fall off the bike, some spokes broke and the rim bent. I question the quality of the rim but the real issue is Diamondback doesn't sell replacement parts! It is impossible to match the color and the size is uncommon as well. I'm left to special order a rim from my local bike shop for $65 (1/4 of the total bike cost) for a rim that doesn't match. No reason to spend more than you need to if the quality and service isn't any better.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles Clarity Women's Fitness Hybrid Bike
product_meta.description: When she's prepared to take her bike adventures beyond the end of the block, the clarity 24 is ready. This bike is a step up from a sidewalk or learning bike, with 24 inch wheels and a 14 speed drivetrain that open up possibilities for longer journeys. The clarity's frame and fork are made from lightweight aluminum, making it easier to manage. It's easy to get on and off due to its low stand over height, which drops the intimidation factor dramatically. The parts on the clarity 24 are very similar to an adult bike, with quality drivetrain parts from Shimano and wide tires for traction on all surfaces.
feature_bullets: Alloy frame with replaceable derailleur hanger for durability
Aero alloy straight blade fork for solid steering
Linear pull brakes provide safe stopping power
14-speed drivetrain gives wide range of gears
24 inch Narrow wheels for smaller fit
